replies.body: DO YOU EVEN CLICK BRO, they should add minion pathing manipulation (herding minions to imprison enemies or slow them down and etc) and heal prevented by grievous items to stat results eh

You used to be able to herd with heimerdinger turrets.

Link related.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvugzSQwaso

OH (I didn't bother watching lol, it looked like a bug or a match with new players that were so new they didn't know about aoes, smite or keeping people from leading minions around in circles to build them up). Thanks for the share, very neat and funny, I wanna try something like that now xP I've tried with other obstacle spells and just pathing but I think noobs are less nooby nowadays

Upvoted, last match Shaco decided to do the Shuffle for 5 seconds instead of Pathing correctly.
Doesn't sound too bad unless you were there and noticed only 2 minions were actually blocking him...

you should try pin people still with obstacle spells that aren't supposed to (unless you is skilled with aim) e.g Trundle rock pinching somebody against a wall or pocketing them in a big enough curve, I still haven't seen much or any teams that are all obstacle champs sadly
